hero.title: Decentralized Staking Platform

withdrawal.warning: Withdrawal includes ONLY your personal funds (available + locked profits + unlocked stakings). Referral balance can be withdrawn separately. A 12% tax is applied to the total amount. All personal balances will be reset after withdrawal.
withdrawal.referralWarning: Referral withdrawal withdraws ONLY the referral commission balance. Your personal funds (available, locked profits, stakings) remain intact.
